physical_appearance:The image shows a colour photograph. It is rectangular and it features a cluster of huts. All of the huts are elevated above the ground on stilts. The huts are brown in colour and they look to be constructed using wood and they have thatched roofs. There is a lone tall tree a little to the right from the centre of the photograph. The background shows the clear blue sky.
